group_1.textLeft: I see... She was attacked by a Magical Girl@in a Labyrinth in Chuo Ward.
And the attacker said she was a Magical Girl@from the west.

group_1.textRight: Yes, that's what I was told.

group_1.textLeft: That's exactly the same as us then. The girl@who attacked Momoko said...
"I'm a Magical Girl from a rival ward."

group_1.textRight: That's suspiciously similar.

group_1.textLeft: If you doubt what we're saying, we can prove@that it's true.

group_1.textRight: Oh?

group_1.textLeft: Just take a peek into our minds with your@unique power.
We can even call Momoko here if you want.

group_1.textRight: I see. That's not a bad idea.

group_1.textLeft: So now you have proof.

group_1.textRight: Yes, I can see you're telling the truth.
Momoko was indeed attacked by a Magical Girl@she didn't know.
Glad to hear that you believe us now.

group_1.textLeft: So, how are you going to prove that your@story is true?

group_1.textRight: Hm?

group_1.textLeft: We can't peek into minds like you can.
So how will you prove that one of your girls@was really attacked?

group_1.textRight: Well...
I was honest. That is my proof.

group_1.textLeft: What's that supposed to mean?

group_1.textRight: I can lie about what I see in people's@minds.
I could've said, "I read your minds and can@see that you're lying."
But I didn't do that.

group_1.textLeft: You're saying that trusting you also@translates to our innocence?

group_1.textRight: That's right.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:100204:lipSynch_1]Mifuyu...

group_1.textRight: I think we can trust her.

group_1.textLeft: All right. I'm sure she didn't plan all of@this from the beginning.
Fine. We believe you.

group_1.textRight: Let's move on, then.

group_1.textLeft: Yes, we have no handle on the situation.
If possible, we'd like your cooperation...

group_1.textRight: Yachiyo! Mifuyu! Huge problem!

group_1.textLeft: What's wrong? We were finally getting@somewhere.

group_1.textRight: I can't really say it out loud...

group_1.textLeft: This sounds like an emergency. Please excuse@us, Kanagi.

group_1.textRight: Don't keep me waiting too long.

group_1.textLeft: We're very sorry about this.

group_1.textRight: Our Magical Girls got attacked again.

group_1.textLeft: What?!

group_1.textRight: A team of Magical Girls in Sankyo Ward was@attacked...
And it's gettin' a little out of control.

group_1.textLeft: Oh no... Can you convince them to keep quiet@about this?

group_1.textRight: That might be tough.
I think all the Magical Girls in Sankyo Ward@already know.
Tsuruno's headed over there, but I'm not@sure she can stop this herself.
They might listen to you guys though.

group_1.textLeft: I'll go. You continue negotiating, Mifuyu.

group_1.textRight: Understood.

group_1.textLeft: Kanagi, I'm sorry, but...

group_1.textRight: Our discussion ends here.

group_1.textLeft: Huh?
I was just informed that we were attacked@by the west again.
We didn't order that.

group_1.textRight: I already know that, since I peeked into your@minds earlier.
But that's why continuing this discussion@is pointless.

group_1.textLeft: What do you mean?

group_1.textRight: What's the use of negotiating with someone@who can't keep tabs on their own girls?
I don't think it would resolve anything.
This is a waste of time. I'll be excusing@myself now.
P-please wait!

group_1.textLeft: It's no use. No chance she'll change her mind@now.
Let's head to Sankyo Ward. We can't allow@this situation to get any worse.

group_1.textRight: Okay...
